name: Vellum
description:
Vellum is a cooperative action roguelike in which players dive into magic tomes to sling inky spells, discover pages of power, and - in a fresh take - choose how their foes evolve.

Group up or go it solo in a quick, dynamic roguelike full of synergy and strategy to discover!


Draw power from your signature ink to infuse your spells with vibrant effects. Dive into the corrupted Tomes of the Illuminated Library and push back the Torn!

Carve your way through a monochromatic enemy, but YOU must determine how they grow to match your strength. Strategically choose your foes’ upgrades and spells, and write your way through the challenges of the Torn.


Band together with your fellow Scribes while shaping your inky spells into unique tools against your enemies. Strategize together to invoke group-wide boons from the Font, reshaping the Tome battlefields.

Fight your way through the echoes of familiar tales and fables as the Torn find new ways to corrupt the Tomes. Apply higher and higher Bindings to each journey and overcome even the toughest obstacles. The dreaded Torn bosses await…

Tale of Contents:

  • Swift Tales: Approachable, under 30-minute roguelike runs crafted for quick gameplay sessions for 1-4 players.
  • Scrolls of Power: Tear through enemies with over 300 powers for you and your team. All powers can be build-makers, no filler.
  • Torn Pages: With over 100 upgrades and enemy effects to choose from, only you will decide how your foes evolve throughout the course of battle.
  • The Font: Invoke unique Tome-themed powers as a team through the mystical Ink Font in combination with your individual builds.
  • Fabled Scribes: Research the power of ink between runs to infuse your Scribe with colorful signature spells and customizable talents!
  • Brutal Bindings: Increase your challenge by affixing bindings to your Tomes. Greater challenge brings greater rewards!
  • Reference Section: All the high quality literature puns you could ever desire.
